full_summary:
===============

### Request for Proposal: Badge, Machine Embroidered

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites bids from qualified vendors for the supply of Machine Embroidered Badges. The requirement is for a firm quantity of 30,750 badges, including an optional "as and when requested" quantity of 30,000 badges, which can be ordered within a 60-month period from contract award.

### Goods
-----------

The goods to be supplied must be Canadian goods, as per Article 503.4 (b) of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement. This means that the products must be wholly manufactured or originate in Canada, or have undergone sufficient change in Canada to satisfy the definition specified under the Canada-United States-Mexico Agreement (CUSMA) Rules of Origin.

### Basis of Selection
----------------------

Bids will be evaluated based on the responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price.

### Submission Requirements
-------------------------

Interested vendors must submit their bids to the RCMP at: marie-eve.brunet@rcmp-grc.gc.ca. Please refer to the attached tender documents for further information.

### Important Notice
---------------------

**Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.**

**Canada will accept submissions and enquiries in either official language of Canada.**

**The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. As a result, the integrity provisions are being applied in RCMP contracting activities, as outlined in the solicitation package.**

**Canada will make available Notices of Proposed Procurement (NPP), solicitations, and related documents for download through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at https://canadabuys.ca.**

### Indigenous Procurement
---------------------------

**The federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource for all levels of government and the private sector to identify Indigenous business capacity. Having a business profile in the IBD will increase your company’s visibility and may provide additional business opportunities.**

Please visit: [www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory](www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory) for more information and to review eligibility criteria.
